responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: What can i do using this application
what are the main functions of this app
Explain the functioning of this app
responses: This application helps you in creating your custom application!! Isn't that cool!! Get to know more about it by trying it yourself.
You can custom build your application with your prefered frontend and backend and additional features. We also show you how your application that you built looks like!!

patterns: tell me about the technology used
Can i build an app using this
responses: This application is built using React in the frontend and Python flask in the backend
The application has been developed using React in the frontend and Python flask in the backend

patterns: please suggest good frontend and backend options
Can i build an app using this
responses: You can use React in the frontend and Python flask in the backend or use a combination of React frontend and Node backend as per convenience in order to build a webapp.
